short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can select multiple inputs at once and write in them at the same time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Select inputs by holding CTRL and clicking on the input field, or by holding CTRL + SHIFT and making a rectangle, in which all inputs get selected. Then whatever you type will be typed to the end of those inputs, or you can press backspace to erase a letter from the back of the input.

Note: this won't work on the currently selected input so you must click outside of the inputs after selecting
